text: Banquet in Silence is a 1930s painting by Marsden Hartley. It is in the collection of the Metropolitan Museum of Art. == Early history and creation == The painting was created in 1935–36 and is composed of oil paint on canvas board. == Later history and display == The artwork was given by Marsden Hartley to Georgia O'Keeffe who then donated it to the Metropolitan Museum of Art. == Description== The work depicts a banquet plate with fish and unidentified fruit on it. == References == Category:Created via preloaddraft Category:Paintings of the Metropolitan Museum of Art
title: Banquet in Silence (Marsden Hartley)
